lines: CS 61AH 99CH 673
249MAKUMI IHUKA A IHUKA
THE NINETY AND NINE
Doh is Ab
Kwakasyaala makumi I huka, Mucimpati ca Mwami
I mwi yakali ku sweekede, Kulale amunzi
Mumalundu yakasweka, Kulale kuzwa ku mwembezi,
Kulale kuzwa ku mwembezi.
Makumi I huka ulijisi, Mwami sena aceya,
Walo mwembezi waingula, I mwi yangu taiko,
Nakuba musinzo ube mubi, Ndaya mulukula ndiyandaule,
Ndaya mulukula ndiyandaule.
Pesi taakwe bafutulwa bakazyi, I lwizi bakalanduka,
Amusinze walo Mwami ngwa inda, Kujana mbelele yakwe,
Ikule mulukula waka imvwa, Ila lila ili afwaafwi kufwa,
Ila lila ili afwaafwi kufwa.
Mwami bulowa obu bwazwa kuli? Buli munzila yonse,
Bwakatikilwa iwa kasowekede, Katana piluka kwabo,
Mwami manza ako a yasilwanzi? Akayaswa a mamvwa mulukula,
Akayaswa a mamvwa mulukula.
Pesi mumalundu onse wakainda, Amu mabwe malamfu,
Wamvwa kulila kuzwa ku julu, Ndakondwa mbelele ya janwa
Bangele bakaimba kucuno, Mukomane Mwami waileta.
Mukombe Mwami waileta.
